steps.title: How to wash your hands before infusion

substeps.title: Step 1
substeps.description: Wet your hands under running water

substeps.title: Step 2
substeps.description: Add soap and cover all areas of your hands

substeps.title: Step 3
substeps.description: Rub your hands together, palm to palm, in a circular motion.

substeps.title: Step 4
substeps.description: Rub the back of your left hand with your right palm, fingers interlaced

substeps.title: Step 5
substeps.description: Rub the back of your right hand with your left palm, fingers interlaced.

substeps.title: Step 6
substeps.description: Rub your hands palm to palm again, with fingers interlaced.

substeps.title: Step 7
substeps.description: Rub with your fingers locked together (interlocked).

substeps.title: Step 8
substeps.description: Hold your right thumb in your left hand and rub it in circles.

substeps.title: Step 9
substeps.description: Do the same with your left thumb.

substeps.title: Step 10
substeps.description: Rub your right fingertips in your left palm using a circular motion.

substeps.title: Step 11
substeps.description: Repeat with your left fingertips in your right palm.

substeps.title: Step 12
substeps.description: Rinse your hands well under running water.

substeps.title: Step 13
substeps.description: Dry your hands completely with a clean paper towel.

substeps.title: Step 14
substeps.description: Use the towel to turn off the tap.

substeps.title: Step 16
substeps.description: Apply hand sanitizer, rubbing it in using the same steps above.
